example.parse: (SBAR (SUB_CONJ أن) (S (NP-TPC-1 (PRON_3FS ها)) (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3FS حاولت) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (S-NOM-OBJ (VP (DET+NOUN.VN+CASE_DEF_ACC الاستفسار) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *)) (PP (PREP من) (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN رؤسائ) (NP (POSS_PRON_3FS ها)))) (PP-CLR (PREP عن) (NP (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_PL+CASE_DEF_GEN المشاركات) (DET+ADJ+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN المعقدة)) (SBAR (WHNP-2 (REL_PRON التي)) (S (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3FS انخرطت) (PP (PREP في) (NP (NP (PRON_3FS ها)) (NP (-NONE- *T*-2)))) (NP-SBJ (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_NOM الشركة)) (PP-MNR (PREP من) (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN دون) (NP (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN الحصول)) (PP (PREP على) (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_INDEF_GEN أجوبة) (ADJ+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_INDEF_GEN مقنعة))))))))))))))))) (PUNC .)))

arg.g: about the engagment by the company without receiving convincing answers

example.arg: عن المشاركات التي انخرطت فيها الشركة من دون الحصول على اجوبة مقنعة
